conclude.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to decide that something is true after considering all the information you have
conclude.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The report concluded that the school should be closed immediately.
Richardson concluded from his studies that equality between the sexes is still a long way off.
conclude.translation[0].definitions[0].n: In more formal English, you can say it is concluded that something is true
It was concluded that the treatment should be stopped
conclude.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to complete something you have been doing, especially for a long time
conclude.translation[0].definitions[1].e: When the investigation is concluded, the results will be sent to the US Attorney’s office.
Francis, having concluded his business with James, left for Miami.
conclude.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to end something such as a meeting, book, event, or speech by doing or saying one final thing
conclude.translation[0].definitions[2].e: To conclude, I’d like to express my thanks to my family.
‘So now, ’ she concluded, ‘I’m trying to bring some order to the garden.’
Each chapter concludes with a short summary.
She concluded by saying she was proud to be from Salford.
conclude.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to decide that something is true after considering all the facts
conclude.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The Stock Exchange concluded that the accounts could be regarded as suspect because they made no reference to such businesses.
We can conclude from the statistics that there is still an imbalance between the opportunities for men and women.
conclude.translation[1].definitions[1].d: to finish arranging an agreement, treaty, deal etc
conclude.translation[1].definitions[1].e: We would like to conclude the deal by the end of the financial year.
conclude.translation[1].definitions[2].d: when something concludes, or you conclude it, it ends
conclude.translation[1].definitions[2].e: By five the interview had at last concluded and we left.
Anxious to conclude the meeting, he added: “All the figures you need are in the business plan.”
